form.url-helptext: URL of Redmine installation (including context path).
form.textFormatting-helptext: Type of text formatting used for redmine comments.
form.autoClose-helptext: Enables the state changes function. SCM-Manager searches for issue keys and issue status keywords in commit messages. If both found in a message SCM-Manager changes the state of the issue in Redmine. Note: It is necessary that users have the same password in SCM-Manager and Redmine.
form.updateIssues-helptext: Enable the automatic update function. SCM-Manager searches for issue keys in commit messages. If a issue id is found SCM-Manager  updates the issue with a comment. Note: It is necessary that users have the same password in SCM-Manager and Redmine.
form.usernameTransformPattern-helptext: Pattern to create a username for the redmine server. {0} - name of the current user {1} - mail address of the current user {2} - display name of the current user'
form.disableRepositoryConfiguration-helptext: Do not allow repository owners to configure Redmine instances.  You have to restart your application server after changing this value.
